content.prompt: People who agreed with the argument made in the speech would most likely have recommended which of the following solutions?

choices.label: Separate but equal segregated facilities to increase job opportunities for white workers
Continuation of the gold standard as the basis for money
Reduced government involvement in the economy in order to create more competition
A stronger government role in the economic system
